verses.verse: "No <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H6481><s%> who is emasculated, <S%H1795><s%> <S%H6481><s%> or has his male <S%H8212><s%> organ <S%H8212><s%> cut <S%H3772><s%> off, <S%H3772><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"No <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H4464><s%> of illegitimate <S%H4464><s%> birth <S%H4464><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of his [descendants,] even <S%H1571><s%> to the tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation, shall enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"No <S%H3808><s%> Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> or Moabite <S%H4125><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of their [descendants,] even <S%H1571><s%> to the tenth <S%H6224><s%> generation, shall ever <S%H5769><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>

because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> they did not meet <S%H6923><s%> you with food <S%H3899><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> on the way <S%H1870><s%> when you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and because <S%H834><s%> they hired <S%H7936><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> from Pethor <S%H6604><s%> of Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> to curse <S%H7043><s%> you.

"Nevertheless, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> was not willing <S%H14><s%> to listen <S%H8085><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> but the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> the curse <S%H7045><s%> into a blessing <S%H1293><s%> for you because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> you.
"You shall never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> their peace <S%H7965><s%> or their prosperity <S%H9186><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your days. <S%H3117><s%>

"You shall not detest <S%H8581><s%> an Edomite, <S%H130><s%> for he is your brother; <S%H251><s%> you shall not detest <S%H8581><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you were an alien <S%H1616><s%> in his land. <S%H776><s%>
"The sons <S%H1121><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> generation who <S%H834><s%> are born <S%H3205><s%> to them may enter <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you go <S%H3318><s%> out as an army <S%H4264><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your enemies, <S%H340><s%> then you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> yourself from every <S%H3605><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

"If <S%H3588><s%> there is among you any <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is unclean <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2889><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of a nocturnal <S%H3915><s%> emission, <S%H7137><s%> then he must go <S%H3318><s%> outside <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> he may not reenter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

"But it shall be when evening <S%H6153><s%> approaches, <S%H6437><s%> he shall bathe <S%H7364><s%> himself with water, <S%H4325><s%> and at sundown <S%H8121><s%> <S%H935><s%> he may reenter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
"You shall also have <S%H1961><s%> a place <S%H3027><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> out there, <S%H8033><s%>

and you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a spade <S%H3489><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> your tools, <S%H240><s%> and it shall be when you sit <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%> you shall dig <S%H2658><s%> with it and shall turn <S%H7725><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> up your excrement. <S%H6627><s%>

"Since <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of your camp <S%H4264><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you and to defeat <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, therefore your camp <S%H4264><s%> must be holy; <S%H6918><s%> and He must not see <S%H7200><s%> anything <S%H1697><s%> indecent <S%H6172><s%> among you lest He turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from you.
"You shall not hand <S%H5462><s%> over <S%H5462><s%> to his master <S%H113><s%> a slave <S%H5650><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has escaped <S%H5337><s%> from his master <S%H113><s%> to you.

"He shall live <S%H3427><s%> with you in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall choose <S%H977><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of your towns <S%H8179><s%> where it pleases <S%H2896><s%> him; you shall not mistreat <S%H3238><s%> him.

"None <S%H3808><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be a cult <S%H6945><s%> prostitute, <S%H6945><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall any <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be a cult <S%H6945><s%> prostitute. <S%H6945><s%>

"You shall not bring <S%H935><s%> the hire <S%H868><s%> of a harlot <S%H2181><s%> or the wages <S%H4242><s%> of a dog <S%H3611><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for any <S%H3605><s%> votive <S%H5088><s%> offering, <S%H5088><s%> for both <S%H1571><s%> <S%H8147><s%> of these are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"You shall not charge <S%H9348><s%> interest <S%H9348><s%> to your countrymen: <S%H251><s%> interest <S%H5392><s%> on money, <S%H3701><s%> food, <S%H400><s%> [or] anything <S%H3605><s%> that may be loaned <S%H9348><s%> at interest. <S%H9348><s%>

"You may charge <S%H9348><s%> interest <S%H9348><s%> to a foreigner, <S%H5237><s%> but to your countryman <S%H251><s%> you shall not charge <S%H9348><s%> interest, <S%H9348><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> that you undertake <S%H3027><s%> <S%H9303><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are about to enter <S%H935><s%> to possess. <S%H3423><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you make <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you shall not delay <S%H309><s%> to pay <S%H9608><s%> it, for it would be sin <S%H2399><s%> in you, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H1875><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> it of you.
"However, if <S%H3588><s%> you refrain <S%H2308><s%> from vowing, <S%H5087><s%> it would not be sin <S%H2399><s%> in you.

"You shall be careful <S%H8104><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H4161><s%> goes <S%H4161><s%> out from your lips, <S%H8193><s%> just <S%H3152><s%> as you have voluntarily <S%H5071><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> what <S%H834><s%> you have promised. <S%H1696><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you enter <S%H935><s%> your neighbor's vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> then you may eat <S%H398><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%> until you are fully <S%H7648><s%> satisfied, <S%H7648><s%> but you shall not put <S%H5414><s%> any in your basket. <S%H3627><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you enter <S%H935><s%> your neighbor's standing <S%H7054><s%> grain, <S%H7054><s%> then you may pluck <S%H6998><s%> the heads <S%H4425><s%> with your hand, <S%H3027><s%> but you shall not wield <S%H5130><s%> a sickle <S%H2770><s%> in your neighbor's standing <S%H7054><s%> grain. <S%H7054><s%>
